db:abstract.db:para: [multiline-strings] A string is spanning over multiple lines.

db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [multiline-strings] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: String contains unescaped line terminator, which is deprecated
What happened?
db:section.db:para: A string spans over multiple lines.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: Strings spanning multiple lines are a non-standard extension of ECMAScript and deprecated in QML. Use template literals instead.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, use template literals or, alternatively, replace the newlines with '\n':
db:section.db:programlisting:
import QtQuick
Item { property string multiLine: `first second third` property string multiLine2: `first second third`
property string alternative: "first
second
third" property string alternative2: "first
" + "second
" + "third" }
